# Making vectors!

### A character vector

```{r}
dogs <- c("teddy", "khora", "waffle", "banjo", "tallie")

class(dogs)
```

```{r}
cats <- c("creamsicle wolf", 14.2, 3L)

class(cats)
```

### A numeric vector

```{r}
years <- c(20, 40, 16, 2)

#Conditional check
#is. <<< asks questions
#as. <<< gives command

is.numeric(years)
is.character(years)
```

```{r}
dog_food <- c(teddy = "purina", khora = "alpo", waffle = "fancy feast")

dog_food

dog_food[2]
```
